appsgate.lig.context.follower.listeners
Interface CoreListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
ContextFollowerTester.TestListener, EUDEInterpreterImpl.CoreEventListener
public interface CoreListener

This interface describe a core listener to by notified when a specific event from a specific component happen.

Since:
May 28, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard

          Method call when the event is catch

          Set the event variable name that is followed
 void setObjectId(java.lang.String objectId)
          Set the object Id corresponding to the core component that trigger the event.

          Set the threshold value that trigger the notification
